sentences.en: Also, the seismic waves used to find oil harm aquatic mammals and disorient whales.
sentences.cn: 同时侦测油源的震波也对海洋哺乳动物造成伤害或使鲸豚惊慌失措.

sentences.en: Dragon's Breath - Disorient changed from 3 sec to 5 sec.
sentences.cn: 龙息的混乱效果增加为5秒.

sentences.en: Foremans Reinforced Helmet : Increases your chance to resist Stun and Disorient effects by 10 %.
sentences.cn: XX头盔: 你抵抗晕眩和魅惑的能力上升10%.

sentences.en: The staff aura makes you immune to the disorient effect.
sentences.cn: 法杖的光环可以免疫迷惑.

sentences.en: These methods all disorient the mind and trick the subconscious into tuning into another part of the astral.
sentences.cn: 这些方法都会使头脑失去方向感，诱使潜意识调谐至星体层的另一部分。

sentences.en: To cause to lose one's bearings; disorient.
sentences.cn: 使失去方向; 使迷失方向.

sentences.en: Tom tossed a handful of concussive grenades to disorient them, but his team kept running.
sentences.cn: 汤姆扔了一把震荡雷让它们不知所措, 但是他们的队伍还在奔跑.

trans.tran_cn: 使迷失方向，使迷惑，使不知所措
